BBEX3.A.CNY.USD.CA.AC.A04: Exchange rates for the US dollar in China / USD 1 = CNY ... (middle)

General: In addition to the official exchange rates, swap market exchange rates existed from August 1992 to December 1993; we do not have any data for these rates or information about their application. The exchange rate system was unified on 1 January 1994 on the basis of the swap market rates.
Source: People's Bank of China, Peking (Central Bank).

Methodology: From 1986 to 1990 calculated on the basis of daily buying and selling rates; from 1991 to 1993 calculated on the basis of mid-month and month-end buying and selling rates; 1994 calculated on the basis of monthly averages (from January to March 1994 only mid-month and month-end rates) and from 1995 on the basis of daily middle rates.
